ygData.subject: from inside the cr chamber
ygData.msgSnippet: Life dreamed as he was being repaired in the cr chamber. All he saw was flowers and plants. The golden sunshine touching his face. But suddenly the sky went

Subject: from inside the cr chamber
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Unknown sub 103
From: kinger01030@...

 Life dreamed as he was being repaired in the cr chamber. All he saw was 
flowers and plants. The golden sunshine touching his face. But suddenly the 
sky went black and a dark figure rose from the horizon. He pointed at him 
with his skeleton type fingers..he saw visions of death and destruction. He 
cryed as these images passed through his body. Finaly he shot at the figure 
and it went away. And all was peacful again in his dreams. He sighed and 
laied in the grass. The evil being was but into dormancy...but for how long?
